hangle: 너희를 이대로 보내면 내가 공작한테 더러운 꼴을 당해서.
first_translate: I’ll get in trouble if you guys go back like this.
cut off what's between their legs.
no... that might not be such a good idea.
thank you so much, my lady.
my lady, please close your eyes.
and cover your ears as well.

hangle: 자르진 말고, 한 대씩 세게 두들겨 줘.
first_translate: don't cut anything off. just give each one a nice punch instead.
take a look at my face first.

hangle: 의뢰를 수행할 때, 물지 말아야 할 상대가 누군지는 기억해야지.
first_translate: make sure you remember whose orders you shouldn't disobey when carrying out missions from now on.
of course I won't forget about this.
it looks like the lecture is over.
the bodies aren't even retrievable anymore...
what shall we do next, your highness?
...and start wiping out all the monsters within the forest.

hangle: 피오나 영애는 아카데미의 연구원들과 있는 게 낫지 않을까.
first_translate: lady fiona would probably be better off helping the researchers at the academy.
from what I saw earlier, they seem quite busy.
that was because he didn't want her going into dangerous places, wasn't it?
work life must always come before personal matters.
besides, this isn't where I belong anyway.

hangle: 일단 황제 폐하께 칙령도 받은 몸이니 열심히 일하죠.
first_translate: let's work diligently since his majesty has given us imperial orders.
going out only once early on doesn't count.

hangle: …아벨이 빨리 돌아와서 네 대타가 되어야 하는데.
first_translate: abel needs to hurry back and take your spot soon.
all you think about is making him work harder.
they still have great chemistry together.
where exactly do you see that?

hangle: 이런, 어딜 봐도 어린 시절처럼 다정하신데요.
first_translate: oh, but they act just like how they used to during their childhood days.

hangle: 겉모습이야 두 분 다 콩나물처럼 쑥쑥 자라셨지만.
first_translate: even though both of you grew taller than bean sprouts.
it's my wife whom I left behind at home.
right before leaving, she told me she got pregnant.
why didn't you tell me sooner?!

hangle: 제 옆이 아니라 부인 곁에 있어야 되잖아요?!
first_translate: instead of being beside me, you need to stay near your wife!

hangle: 그래도 주군께서 예정일 전에 돌아가게 해 준다고 하셨으니까요.
first_translate: at least his grace said he'd let me return before the due date.

hangle: 아벨, 사람 부려 먹는 게 너무 독해!
first_translate: abel, you're too ruthless in working people hard!

hangle: 제가 더 빨리 헤일론으로 돌아갈 수 있도록 해줄게요.
first_translate: I'll try to finish things quickly so you can head back to hailon sooner.
I understand why you were rushing,

hangle: 숲에 번개를 난사하면 아군이 겁을 먹는단 말이다.
first_translate: but shooting lightning everywhere scares everyone else.
still, thanks to you, we finished faster.

hangle: 영애의 힘으로 이 죽은 땅을 복구시킬 수 있을 것 같나요?
first_translate: do you think you could restore this dead land using your powers?
I'm pretty sure some parts may be possible,

hangle: 이렇게 넓은 범위의 죽은 땅은 저도 처음이라…
first_translate: but I've never seen such a large area of dead land before...

hangle: 성녀님은 한 분이고, 죽은 땅은 여러 개인데…
first_translate: there's only one saintess while there are many lands dying across the empire...
to begin with, it's impossible to handle everything yourself.

hangle: 맞아요, 유니스 영애가 부족한 게 아니에요
first_translate: yes, it's not because lady eunice lacks ability.
try taking it slow without getting impatient.
absolutely. we'll also lend a hand however we can.

hangle: 어려운 부분이 있으면 혼자 앓지 말아요, 영애.
first_translate: if you ever run into any problems, don't hesitate to ask others for help, okay?
with everyone supporting me like this,

hangle: 혼자 약한 소리를 할 수는 없어.
first_translate: I can't afford to show weakness.
I apologize for worrying you all.

hangle: 이러다가 너무 금방 끝내버리는 건 아닌지 몰라.
first_translate: at this rate, maybe we'll end up finishing way ahead of schedule.
